main.name: Rajat Rai
main.description: Mission-driven full stack developer with a passion for machine learning, efficient algorithms, thoughtful UI design and collaboration
main.bio: I have 3 years of experience with development across all kind of technologies (shell scripting --> back-end --> full-stack -->machine learning), with a focus on full-stack development and machine learning. I essentially want to make things that make a difference.

resume.skillmessage: Schooling doesn't assure employment but skill does.

education.description: Next milestone to achieve and mastrering the art of machine learning in the process.

work.description: Integrated varies vendor API’s using Cloud Elements, which is a cloud API and manage all of their APIs through a unified platform. Learnt about RESTful API and authentication techniques(OAuth, OAuth2, JWT, etc.) in cloud servers.

testimonials.text: Rajat’s a solid developer and very adaptable to team dynamics. A great guy to work with!

Rajat is a joy to work with. His excellent soft skills and a well-rounded personality make working with him a great experience. Not only is he a great team player but also is a quick learner. During his time at Credit Suisse, he learned an entirely new tech stack in a couple of weeks and afterwards went on to become the go-to person for almost everything related to our project. It's been awesome working with him and watch him jump into every project with curiosity, gratitude, and an infectiously upbeat attitude.
